medley.util

Class Validator

  • java.lang.Object
    • medley.util.Validator

  • public final class Validator
extends Object
    Validator class that contains methods used to check values accuracy.
    Author:
    Salvatore Gentile

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Validator() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void dots(int dots)
      Checks the specified number of dots and throws an exception if it is not valid.
      static void frequency(double frequency, double min, double max)
      Checks the specified frequency and throws an exception if it is not between the specified minimum frequency value and the specified maximum frequency value.
      static void midiNumber(int midiNumber)
      Checks the specified MIDI note number and throws an exception if it is not valid.
      static void pianoKey(int pianoKey)
      Checks the specified piano key number and throws an exception if it is not valid.
      static void semitones(int semitones, int min, int max)
      Checks the specified semitones value and throws an exception if it is not between the specified minimum semitones value and the specified maximum semitones value.
      static void transpose(int midiNumber, int semitones)
      Checks if the specified MIDI note number can be incremented by the specified number of half steps; If not, it throws an exception.
      static void volume(int volume)
      Checks the specified volume value and throws an exception if it is not valid.

    • Method Detail

      • frequency

        public static void frequency(double frequency,
                             double min,
                             double max)
                      throws IllegalArgumentException
        Checks the specified frequency and throws an exception if it is not between the specified minimum frequency value and the specified maximum frequency value.
        Parameters:
        frequency - a specified frequency.
        min - a specified minimum frequency value.
        max - a specified maximum frequency value.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException

      • midiNumber

        public static void midiNumber(int midiNumber)
                       throws IllegalArgumentException
        Checks the specified MIDI note number and throws an exception if it is not valid.
        Parameters:
        midiNumber - a specified MIDI note number.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if midiNumber < 0 or midiNumber > 127

      • pianoKey

        public static void pianoKey(int pianoKey)
                     throws IllegalArgumentException
        Checks the specified piano key number and throws an exception if it is not valid.
        Parameters:
        pianoKey - a specified piano key number.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if pianoKey < 1 or pianoKey > 88

      • transpose

        public static void transpose(int midiNumber,
                             int semitones)
                      throws IllegalArgumentException
        Checks if the specified MIDI note number can be incremented by the specified number of half steps; If not, it throws an exception.
        Parameters:
        midiNumber - a specified MIDI note number.
        semitones - a specified number of half steps.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if midiNumber + semitones < 1 or midiNumber + semitones > 88

      • volume

        public static void volume(int volume)
                   throws IllegalArgumentException
        Checks the specified volume value and throws an exception if it is not valid.
        Parameters:
        volume - a specified volume value.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException

                             int min,
                             int max)
                      throws IllegalArgumentException
        Checks the specified semitones value and throws an exception if it is not between the specified minimum semitones value and the specified maximum semitones value.
        Parameters:
        semitones - a specified number of half steps.
        min - a specified minimum semitones value.
        max - a specified maximum semitones value.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException
